fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Judge: If you have successfully attacked at least 3 different people during this phase, you will learn how many of them truly do not win with you.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Command: Create a 1HP Soldier. It will have a hand size of 2, and draws 2 cards a phase MAX. You may control this like a normal player, however it will not show up on the playerlist or be directly attacked. [1 use, Unique]
- Takedown: Pick a player. Deal 2 HP unblockable damage at the end of the phase. [1 use, Unique, Night, UOR3]
- Aggression: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. [3 uses, 2 CD]
